attributes.action: Show the David Attenborough documentary A life on our planet to ALL high schools
attributes.additional_details: Because we need to educate our future generation on protecting our planet.
attributes.background: To broadcast the documentary to all students, in high schools, colleges and universities

rejection.details:
The educational materials used to teach school students is a matter for individual schools, not the Government or House of Commons.

We have published the following related petition, which you might like to sign:

Introduce a Climate Change subject to the National School Curriculum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318835
